extension.name: JFusion Magento Select Block
extension.author: JFusion Development Team
extension.description: This module will display the content of an existing static CMS block of Magento into Joomla. You need to have the magelib plugin system and Jfusion component installed. Apply first the Magento plugin selection then select the static CMS block.

field.name: magento_plugin
field.label: Jfusion Magento plugin
field.description: Select the plugin of Magento to use for this module. Note that it\'s used by the next params. So you\'ll need to apply before to set the others params

field.name: block_id
field.label: Static CMS Block of Magento
field.description: Choose the existing static CMS block of Magento to integrate it in Joomla

field.name: cache
field.label: Caching
field.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

field.name: cache_time
field.label: Cache Time
field.description: The time before the module is recached
